definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: After walking through the fields he had big clumps of soil on his boots.
sentences.chinese: 穿过田野后，他的两只靴子满是泥块。

sentences.english: We settled in, getting the wood stove going and then propping our boots around it to dry.
sentences.chinese: 我们安顿下来，生起木柴炉，把靴子放在炉边烤干。

sentences.english: Hearing the wheels on the drawbridge, Puss in Boots hastened out.
sentences.chinese: 听见吊桥上车轮的声音，穿靴子的猫急忙跑了出来。

sentences.english: His boots were small and neatly blacked.
sentences.chinese: 他的靴子很小，用黑靴油擦得很亮。

sentences.english: To get his boots wet in such cold weather might kill him.
sentences.chinese: 若要得到他的靴子湿在这么冷的天气可能会杀了他。

sentences.english: This distinctive lacing is worn on military boots by paratroopers and ceremonial guard units.
sentences.chinese: 这一共同的系带是由戴伞兵和礼节警卫部队军事靴子。

sentences.english: I never use the eraser, only the mask. Use the mask to fix with the splash so it fits the boot.
sentences.chinese: 使用蒙版来修正喷溅，以使其与模特的靴子相协调。

sentences.english: She pulled on her boots and then left the house.
sentences.chinese: 她穿上靴子，然后离家走了。

sentences.english: Before entering the house he stamped his feet to shake the snow off his boots.
sentences.chinese: 进屋前他跺跺脚来抖落靴子上的雪。

sentences.english: With each step the wearer's feet slide around.
sentences.chinese: 每走一步，穿靴者的脚都会在靴子里四处滑动。

sentences.english: Take off your boots. Prick each of your toes and fingers.
sentences.chinese: 脱了你的靴子，戳戳每根脚趾和手指。

sentences.english: She drew off the boots and put them, lolling side by side.
sentences.chinese: 她脱掉靴子，并且把两只鞋子靠在一起，放好。

sentences.english: You aren’t spending your time polishing 50 pairs of shoes and boots.
sentences.chinese: 你再不用花时间去擦50双鞋子和靴子。

sentences.english: And we know exactly why she chose that boot.
sentences.chinese: 并且我们要清楚她选择这款靴子的真正缘由。

sentences.english: Put on your boots. Splash ih the puddles.
sentences.chinese: 穿上你的靴子，飞溅在水坑里。

sentences.english: The flap of material under the laces or buckles of a shoe.
sentences.chinese: 鞋或靴子上鞋带下的一块布。
